name: misidentification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of wrongly saying or thinking that someone or something is a particular person or thing: People have been wrongly arrested as a result of misidentification. The new system should result in fewer misidentifications. The men were arrested and charged because of eyewitness mis-identification. Related words
identification
misidentify
More examplesFewer examplesBiometrics are used to prevent deliberate misidentification.Eyewitness misidentification is the most common cause of wrongful convictions.He said the problem of misidentification of patients in hospitals had been overstated.
